library(readl)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

df <- read_csv("          ")

chem_Ps <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Chem', P <= 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)
chem_Pb <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Chem', P > 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)
phys_Ps <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Phys', P <= 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)
phys_Pb <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Phys', P > 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)
med_Ps <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Phys', P <= 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)
med_Pb <- df %>% filter(Field == 'Phys', P > 0.5) |> select(Scientist Name, Nobel Prize, P, Total Citations)

chem_plot <- chem_Ps |> ggplot(aes(x = P)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 25, fill = "blue", color = "black")
            + facet_wrap(~Scientist_Name)
            + labs(title = "Histogram", xlab = "Number of Citations", y = "Number of Papers")
            + theme_minimal()
